thread.title: Cheerleading To Be Recognized As A Sport
thread.title_full: Cheerleading To Be Recognized As A Sport

author: Ralph Wood
title: Cheerleading To Be Recognized As A Sport
text:
Cheerleading To Be Recognized As A Sport Posted: rwood@kmph.com Fresno - 
Governor Brown signed a bill on Wednesday that will make competitive cheer a CIF sport beginning in 2017. 
The Executive Director of the CIF, Robert Blake, favors the action he says will "allow student-athletes involved in competitive cheer to enjoy greater opportunities to display their athletic talents in a safe environment." 
The next step is to develop standards and guidelines to help CIF schools implement competitive cheerleading.
